member.name: ID2D1GdiMetafile1.GetDpi
member.summary: Gets the DPI reported by the metafile.
member.param: Receives the horizontal DPI reported by the metafile.
Receives the vertical DPI reported by the metafile.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1GdiMetafile1.GetSourceBounds
member.summary:
Gets the bounds of the metafile in source space in DIPs. This corresponds
to the frame rect in an EMF/EMF+.
member.param: The bounds, in DIPs, of the metafile.
member.returns: S_OK if successful, otherwise a failure HRESULT.

member.name: ID2D1GdiMetafile1
member.summary: This interface performs all the same functions as the existing ID2D1GdiMetafile interface. It also enables accessing the metafile DPI and bounds.
